holes.original_proof:
norm_num [ha, Finset.sum_range_succ, coeff_add, coeff_mul, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_ofNat]
try cases k <;> norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, coeff_add, coeff_mul, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_ofNat]
try ring_nf at * <;> norm_num
try linarith
try nlinarith
try omega
try ring_nf at * <;> norm_num
try linarith
try nlinarith
try omega
try
  {norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, coeff_add, coeff_mul, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_ofNat] at * <;>
        ring_nf at * <;>
      norm_num at * <;>
    linarith
}
try
  {norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, coeff_add, coeff_mul, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_ofNat] at * <;>
        ring_nf at * <;>
      norm_num at * <;>
    nlinarith
}
try
  {norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, coeff_add, coeff_mul, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_ofNat] at * <;>
        ring_nf at * <;>
      norm_num at * <;>
    omega
}
